news_title: Ethereum Treats Quantum As Imminent Threat: $2M Emergency Team Deployed
news_subtitle: Ethereum Foundation creates dedicated post-quantum cryptography team, announces $2M in prizes, and multi-client testnets to protect against quantum threats.

news_title: Ethereum Foundation Forms Post-Quantum Team, Plans Strategic Engineering Shift
news_subtitle: Ethereum Foundation announces post-quantum technology focus, forming a dedicated engineering team to enhance network security and resilience. Read original article on coincu.com
